about_the_game:
This template is the official game template produced by GameCreator - Feather of cyan.
It is an RPG game template without any built-in combat system, which can be used to create stories, solve puzzles and other games.
At the same time, it is also helpful for senior developers to expand and add combat systems.

Please note that:The DLC content has been included in the software ontology, and this page is only used to display part of the content contained in the template

Joystick and SteamDeck support

Visual editing

Support visual editing of game content throughout.

Main characteristics

Supporting 1-8 direction avatar
Support grid moving and pixel level moving
Support button running (running action can be set)
Support archiving and file reading, and self added attributes will be automatically archived
Support custom setting of grid size (default 48) and resolution
Supports drawing tile and autotile
Support the whole picture as a map layer, and support multi-layer vision
With backpack props and store system
Game controller, keyboard and mouse operations are supported by default
Support multiple events
Visually set avatar, animation, standing avatar, interface, etc
Support for script extensions (TypeScript) and plug-ins
More features for you to experience!

About the materials built in the template

The template contains a large number of pixel style materials, music, sound effects, interfaces, etc.









Some of the games made using this template

《觅光》：

Rules on material utilization

The built-in materials of the template is allowed to be commercially available.
If it is used in a non GameCreator engine, you need to purchase GameCreator software and indicate the source of GameCreator
It is not allowed to resell slightly modified material versions, but free sharing is allowed and must be the same as this rule.

This template is the official game template produced by GameCreator - Feather of cyan.
It is an RPG game template without any built-in combat system, which can be used to create stories, solve puzzles and other games.
At the same time, it is also helpful for senior developers to expand and add combat systems.

Please note that:The DLC content has been included in the software ontology, and this page is only used to display part of the content contained in the template

Joystick and SteamDeck support

Visual editing

Support grid moving and pixel level moving

Support the whole picture as a map layer, and support multi-layer vision
With backpack props and store system

It is not allowed to resell slightly modified material versions, but free sharing is allowed and must be the same as this rule.
name: GameCreator - RPG - 苍之羽 - Feather of cyan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i3-3200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT750及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i5-4460+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
